name: FIN_ASST_INFO
description: This table contains financial assistance information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: Stores the financial assistance tracker associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_EXCL_YN
columns.description: Stores if the hospital account is not eligible for financial assistance.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the source of the financial assistance information on the hospital account.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who last updated the financial assistance tracker on the hospital account.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant at which the user updated the financial assistance tracker on the hospital account.
